attributes.action: Give Patients better rights to treatment
attributes.additional_details:
Patients deserve to have treatment that will give them a better quality of life.

The NHS was well equipped in the '80s and '90s, but now patients are being forced to keep quiet about the poor service that is often given.

I would like to see patients being given the chance of going to see a good specialist or surgeon who can offer the best treament for their condition.

If patients are not given the right to choose their surgeon/specialist, then they would often keep quiet, which would then lead to dire concesquences.
